title: Plugins for levelup
description: Modules that add functionality to [levelup]. They qualify as such if they monkey-patch a [levelup] instance or return an API matching [levelup].

cluster-levelup.description: Wrap any [levelup] instance for [`cluster`](https://nodejs.org/api/cluster.html) usage among multiple processes.

description: Add a `ttl` (time-to-live) option to [levelup] for `put()` and `batch()`.
level-ttl.author: Rod Vagg

level-cache.description: A caching module you can place in front of a [levelup] database. It will cache a subset of the database in an in-memory LRU cache based on configuration. It has an optional synchronous API which will return from the cache only.

level-set.description: Add a `set` method for saving objects in a tree-like structure.

level-push.description: Add a `push` method for saving objects using [level-set] with auto-generated UUID.
